@gendidwight ha happy to speak out

A slight #breeze sweeping through #Wellington tonight. Even had to bring the flag in!
@muerk thank you for your kindness
@muerk it’s tough yes but Christ walks with the outsider - in my heart I know this is a blessed space
@gendidwight Christ’s justice is the act of making all whole - this is what we are called to emulate I humbly believe
@clare_barrie no i know - it is just wrong as so many levels
@FrBrianD @StPetersWillis that is kind - the Cathedral has never judged us - but the larger Church is hostile and unsafe. Not for us.
@muerk pragmaticaly that is true, but theologically #gsthw16 was wrong to “shelve” us like inanimate objects
@JohnGillespie20 that’s kind thank you John
Archbishops assertions of future way forward hollow & insincere. And they think I will stick around #ugtbkm #gsthw16 https://t.co/iDuehNyPIv
My Open Letter to the Church #gsthw16 https://t.co/sD26YgVPEf
@StephenJacobi can we please be honest with words, no ducking for cover, ongoing support for oppression - we cannot sugar coat #gsthw16
@FrBrianD thanks for being the only one with balls to tell us, I am disgusted and happy to leave my Dio in Wellington to their own devices
@clare_barrie thats BS - #Unity does not leave us outside - its violent exclusion - call it by its name #gsthw16
Done w Anglican Church - bunch of hypocrites - I will not sit in the pews of the oppressed - I will be outside where my God stands #gsthw16
Even conservative Italy knows how to move forward #gsthw16 https://t.co/am5Fmjexyk
@nzherald yes we saw a UFO flying out of Parliament yesterday - no wait - that was #JohnKey being kicked out #nzqt
@FrBrianD seems to be the never end story of Synod not wanting to share the terrible outcomes. Over this church.
#eqnz solid shaking in Wellington City just now
@gendidwight dont think we are getting anything today since they are off doing blessings (lucky land)
@FoxMarama @TeUruroaFlavell sadly Labour does not seem keen on cross-party co-operation these days
@revhirini absolutely - tactic of the powerful is always to silence - with no real commitment to deeply hearing and changing
@revhirini calling out the truth is not being a hater
Too funny https://t.co/kSkpJZg1sG
Shameful approach #nzpol https://t.co/pbwQEtHp2z
@petercarrell @gendidwight @squeakycog or we could engage and try to understand we have lots in common in our faith, even in our anger
@petercarrell @squeakycog sometimes we have to express our anger, even if we dont like what the other says
@squeakycog @gendidwight F them is an expression of the pain we carry through persistent actions of others, I hold pain and promise together
@squeakycog @gendidwight salvation is secured by God alone, u know that, u only need stand next to ppl so they know God is near
@squeakycog well, isnt it time we find a way love each other for what we DO have in common? And surrender the rest to God to bear for us?
@squeakycog @gendidwight u find it in your heart to love the other, even if we exchange harsh words, we focus on the christ who leads us on
@squeakycog @gendidwight the threat of being on the outside sux doesnt it Zane, have lived that for decades, y cant there be a common basis
@squeakycog @gendidwight you accommodate the entire church - dont be a drama queen - we simply need to share the church - no more no less
@squeakycog you do not know me, I have tolerated and stood by more orthodoxy that you know, if you dont want to engage, walk away
@squeakycog your ppl can exclude me, I can respond, this does not mean I lack faith/compassion or not desire unity, unity is a 2 way street
@squeakycog balance of bible is about Christs grace/mercy, not law out of context, the Spirit leads into truth and is not dead in the past
@squeakycog 2 integrities work when we can still hold a common understanding of Christs redemptive love, if we cannot then there is no unity
@squeakycog unity here means keeping people out while you come to terms with a gospel of inclusion, that is historical but not truthful
@squeakycog I am just as much on the journey of transformation through faith in Christ, even if you cant accept that
@squeakycog fantastic theology Zane - just what we need a faith based on exclusion. Enjoy your shrinking club #gsthw16
@RevHelenJacobi surprised at your comments re Welly - conversations in our Dio suggested a willingness for a way fwd even with differences
Dehumanisation marks not only those whose humanity has been stolen, but also those who have stolen it. Paulo Freire
Here is a thought for #gsthw16 https://t.co/YXkK3HCZDd
@muerk @gendidwight yes of course Teressa - just saying protestant puts the other Catholic sacraments as not so central - no slight
@muerk @gendidwight this differentiates us from Catholicism - a reminder that Christ’s life is central, the rest are nice to haves
It is interesting to hear those who actively exclude cry foul of being excluded. God has a sense of humour. #gsthw16
@gendidwight oh dear! How many Anglicans to change a lightbulb? Depends if #gsthw16 can agree, just wait 4 more years, then we will know
@revhirini same place where unity was defined as the oppressed accepting the role of the oppressor, rather than radical transformation
@squeakycog wish i could say it was a tempting offer… the sales pitch is, um, lacking :-/
@squeakycog not kidding u. Stand outside the church for decades and tell me how safe it is.
I wonder, who is #gsthw16 to judge how wide the love of God is. The one Christ gave it fully to all. How simple is that gospel?
@squeakycog if u have 2 LGBT and 98 non - who do u think is making decisions. My point is that LGBT are given no safe voice in this church
@squeakycog i dont recall commenting on GS composition. Your choice to read it that way.
@gendidwight once the thesis havr been nailed to the cathedral door I suspect
The normative experience of church is being a silenced outsider, especially re gender/sexual equality #gsthw16 https://t.co/hShBwc2PhN
‘I do not accept… history as determinism. I embrace history as a possibility’. Paulo Freire
@clare_barrie ty Claire - my prayer is that all will see how wide the love of God truly is
@gendidwight no I agree it is frustrating. It’s only good intentions wanting to hear what’s happening
@auckanglican well I’ve been told - sorry for showing interest
